flavorText: It has no apparent purpose or direction. It simply drifts, buoyed by breezes both tangible and otherworldly.

foreignData.flavorText: Er verfolgt keinen ersichtlichen Zweck und kein Ziel. Er treibt einfach, beflügelt von schwachen Brisen aus dem Jenseits.
foreignData.name: Moorland-Herumtreiber
foreignData.text: Delirium — Der Moorland-Herumtreiber hat Flugfähigkeit, solange dein Friedhof vier oder mehr unterschiedliche Kartentypen enthält.

foreignData.flavorText: No parece tener propósito ni destino. Simplemente vaga mecido por las brisas, tanto las tangibles como las sobrenaturales.
foreignData.name: Errante del Páramo
foreignData.text: Delirio — El Errante del Páramo tiene la habilidad de volar mientras entre las cartas de tu cementerio haya cuatro o más tipos de cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: Il semble errer sans but. Il se contente de dériver, flottant au gré de vents à la fois tangibles et éthérés.
foreignData.name: Dériveur landéen
foreignData.text: Délire — Le Dériveur landéen a le vol tant qu'il y a au moins quatre types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: All'apparenza, non ha uno scopo né una meta. Si limita a fluttuare, sospinto da correnti terrene e ultraterrene.
foreignData.name: Vagabondo della Brughiera
foreignData.text: Delirio — Il Vagabondo della Brughiera ha volare fintanto che ci sono quattro o più tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: はっきりとした目的も行き先もなく、この世とあの世の風に流されるのみ。
foreignData.name: ムーアランドの流れ者
foreignData.text: 昂揚 ― あなたの墓地にあるカードにカード・タイプが合計４種類以上含まれるかぎり、ムーアランドの流れ者は飛行を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText: 뚜렷한 목적이나 방향은 없다. 그저 눈에 보이는 기괴한 바람에 이끌려 이리저리 떠돌 뿐이다.
foreignData.name: 이탄지 떠돌이
foreignData.text: 섬망 — 당신의 무덤에 네 개 이상의 카드 유형이 있는 한, 이탄지 떠돌이는 비행을 가진다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ele não tem propósito nem direção aparente. Ele fica simplesmente à deriva, flutuando em brisas tanto tangíveis quanto sobrenaturais.
foreignData.name: Errante da Charneca
foreignData.text: Delírio — Errante da Charneca terá voar enquanto houver quatro ou mais tipos de card entre os cards de seu cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: У него нет ни целей, ни предназначения. Ветер просто несет его изменчивый, потусторонний силуэт.
foreignData.name: Видение Вересковых Пустошей
foreignData.text: Буйство — Видение Вересковых Пустошей имеет Полет, пока среди карт на вашем кладбище есть не менее четырех типов карт.

foreignData.flavorText: 它既没有明显的目的，也没有明确的方向。不过是随着微风在实界与异界之间来回飘荡。
foreignData.name: 荒野漂泊灵
foreignData.text: 躁狂～只要你坟墓场中牌的类别有四种或更多，荒野漂泊灵便具有飞行异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 它既沒有明顯的目的，也沒有明確的方向。不過是隨著微風在實界與異界之間來回飄盪。
foreignData.name: 荒野漂泊靈
foreignData.text: 躁狂～只要你墳墓場中牌的類別有四種或更多，荒野漂泊靈便具有飛行異能。

name: Moorland Drifter
originalText: Delirium — Moorland Drifter has flying as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Flying only matters as blockers are chosen. Causing Moorland Drifter to gain flying after blockers are chosen won’t cause it to become unblocked.

The card types in Magic are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal (a card type that appears on some older cards). Supertypes (such as legendary and basic) and subtypes (such as Human and Equipment) are not counted.
The number of card types matters, not the number of cards. For example, Wicker Witch (an artifact creature) along with Catalog (an instant) and Chaplain’s Blessing (a sorcery) will enable delirium.
Because you consider only the characteristics of a double-faced card’s front face while it’s not on the battlefield, the types of its back face won’t be counted for delirium.

In some rare cases, you can have a token or a copy of a spell in your graveyard at the moment that an object’s delirium ability counts the card types among cards in your graveyard, before that token or copy ceases to exist. Because tokens and copies of spells are not cards, even if they are copies of cards, their types will never be counted.

text: Delirium — Moorland Drifter has flying as long as there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
